text:
Looking at this historical letter, I can identify the following information:

- The letter is dated "5. Mai 1928" (May 5, 1928)
- It is addressed to "An die Basler Rheinschiffahrts-A.G., BASEL"
- The sender is "Herr Direktor W. Stauffacher, Pr√§sident unseres Vereins" (Mr. Director W. Stauffacher, President of our association)
- There is no explicit title for the letter
- The letter ends with "Hochachtend" (Respectfully) but no signature is visible
